mapper.select: select id, username, password, name, sex, dept_id, email_address, phone_number, profile_picture, create_time, update_time from user
mapper.insert: insert into user(username, password, name, sex, dept_id, email_address, phone_number, profile_picture, create_time, update_time) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{deptId}, #{emailAddress}, #{phoneNumber}, #{profilePicture}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.update:
update user
username = #{username},
password = #{password},
name = #{name},
sex = #{sex},
dept_id = #{deptId},
email_address = #{emailAddress},
phone_number = #{phoneNumber},
profile_picture = #{profilePicture},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
